entries.journal_entry_description: Meet with a Rebel officer who has information for the Empire.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Meet with a Rebel officer who has information for the Empire.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Fight your way out and defeat the Rebel officer who set you up. Hurry, time is crucial!
entries.task02_journal_entry_title: Find and Defeat the Rebel Officer
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Return to Colonel Veers at the Emperor's Retreat.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Return to Colonel Veers at the Emperor's Retreat in failure.
entries.task07_comm_message_text: Prepare to die, Imperial dog. You'll never escape this bunker alive.
